Package entity

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Patient
public class Patient extends User
The Patient class represents a patient in the hospital management system. It extends the User class to add additional patient-specific attributes and methods.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the patient
      password - the password of the patient
      name - the name of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      contactInfo - the contact information of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      pastDiagnoses - a list of past diagnoses of the patient
      pastTreatments - a list of past treatments of the patient
